title: 418: CHATTY BROS: The Bros Go Back to School!
itunes:title: 418: CHATTY BROS: The Bros Go Back to School!
description:
Grayston and Evan get tangential, play “Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?”, and do some Plug Somethin’! Join The Bros next week when they start their weekly recaps of The Bachelorette(s)!

 

PLUG SOMETHIN’:

***Joshua Preston’s polaroid postcards: Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/joshuappreston/ Website - https://jppreston.com/ 

***Ebb & Flo Studio: Etsy - https://www.etsy.com/shop/EbbFloStudio Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ebbflostudio/ 

***Fritzet: Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/shopfritzet/ Website - https://fritzet.com/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

CALM: Get 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/CHATTY

WILDGRAIN: Get $30 off the first box - PLUS free Croissants in every box when you go to WILDGRAIN.COM/CHATTY to start your subscription!
